summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3214 for the improvement of East 56th Street, East 57th Street and East 58th Street, each from 5th Avenue Northeast to Latona Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 39729, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
